org.rocketproplab.marginalstability.flightcomputer.subsystems

Class Telemetry

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.rocketproplab.marginalstability.flightcomputer.subsystems.Telemetry
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TestHeartbeatCommand.TestTelemetry

    public class Telemetry
extends java.lang.Object
    A reporter for telemetry. It will sends the packet periodically to the Command Box with the information given.
    Author:
    Max Apodaca

      Telemetry(java.util.logging.Logger logger, PacketRelay relay)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Telemetry

        public Telemetry(java.util.logging.Logger logger,
                 PacketRelay relay)
        Creates a new telemetry subsystem that logs to the given logger and uses the given packet reply to send its packets.
        Parameters:
        logger - the logger to use for info output
        relay - the relay to use for sending packets

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Telemetry getInstance()

      • reportTelemetry

        public void reportTelemetry(SCMPacketType type,
                            double data)
        Reports a double to the command box
        Parameters:
        type - the packet type to send with the double
        data - the double to send

      • reportTelemetryHex

        public void reportTelemetryHex(SCMPacketType type,
                               int data)
        Reports an integer to the command box in base 16 to allow for greater data to be set.
        Parameters:
        type - the data type to send
        data - the data to send, must fit in 5 characters

      • reportTelemetry

        public void reportTelemetry(SCMPacketType type,
                            int data)
        Reports an integer to the command box. If greater than max then infinity is sent.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of data to send
        data - the data to be sent, must fit in 5 character

      • reportTelemetry

        private void reportTelemetry(SCMPacketType type,
                             int data,
                             java.lang.String format,
                             int max,
                             int min)
        Internally report the integer value using the given constraints
        Parameters:
        type - the type of packet to send
        data - the integer to be sent
        format - the format string to print this integer
        max - the maximum value (if greater prints infinity)
        min - the minimum value (if less prints - infinity)

        Send the error to the Command Box
        Parameters:
        error - the error to inform the command box of
